title: Syndra is so damn Lazy
body:
https://67.media.tumblr.com/fcd9b4278c6a3652dac207f74915ac33/tumblr_oc4guvBYV11t11cf2o1_1280.png

She uses her orbs to get her toast!

She's also wearing sweat pants, and as a lazy person that wears sweat pants all the time I can confirm that those are the pants of lazy people!


FREE SYNDRA'S BALLS!

Let's get it trending people.

#FreeSyndra'sBalls

SLAVERY IS WRONG!
